criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients who will be discharged from hospital (acute geriatric care unit) between January and March 2020 and who will return to their home or to institution for elderly persons
- patients for whom there will be at least one change in their medicines between their admission and their discharge from hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who don't want to participate in this study
